episode.description: Taxis that Carry Dreams: Despite a disability, Yuichi is passionate about art, especially when it's about his other great love: taxis. Follow him as he shares his art with a uniquely gentle touch.
episode.subtitle: Taxis that Carry Dreams
episode.title: Spirit of Resilience

episode.description: Mamma Mercato's Wonder Women: Documents "Mamma Mercato," a non-profit organization that helps moms pursue their dreams, unleash their creativity, and open businesses.
episode.subtitle: Mamma Mercato's Wonder Women
episode.title: Spirit of Resilience

episode.description: Reaching the World from a Wheelchair: Follow Maco as she shares her daily life online, helping people understand the challenges brought by disability and putting a human face on such sensitive issues.
episode.subtitle: Reaching the World from a Wheelchair
episode.title: Spirit of Resilience

episode.description: Finding Home in a Fishing Community: Documents a group of young women who found a new home in Kesennuma City and their efforts together with long-time residents in helping the community.
episode.subtitle: Finding Home in a Fishing Community
episode.title: Spirit of Resilience

episode.description: City Past, Winemaking Future: Documents young former urbanites working to build a future in winemaking with a strong desire to bring Japanese wine to a whole new level.
episode.subtitle: City Past, Winemaking Future
episode.title: Spirit of Resilience

episode.description: Living a More Beautiful Life: Features a beauty salon where the staff work in a personally and professionally balanced environment, bringing a sense of joy to clients and helping everyone to shine.
episode.subtitle: Living a More Beautiful Life
episode.title: Spirit of Resilience

episode.description: Raising Fruit with Style: Documents a group of young farmers in Niigata Prefecture as they try to promote their region through humor and innovative agricultural techniques.
episode.subtitle: Raising Fruit with Style
episode.title: Spirit of Resilience

episode.description: Apples and Pop Idols: Documents "Ringo Musume," an idol group from Aomori Prefecture and their efforts to make a difference in their hometown.
episode.subtitle: Raising Fruit with Style
episode.title: Spirit of Resilience
